Job Description: Job Description   In this role, you'll be responsible for writing, debugging and refactoring test code and automated test scripts. You'll typically work closely with software engineers to reach a common understanding of the code base and test coverage at unit level, collaborate with business analysts to make sure the required business scenarios are covered in the acceptance test scripts, and work on both functional and non-functional areas of the application.  Qualifications    Experience creating, adding to and maintaining test automation frameworks such as Selenium and JMeter.     Experience with Java, Selenium Webdriver & Cucumber for automation of test scripts for new and existing functionality.     Experience working with Cloud Platforms and Continuous Integration, including the delivery of CI aligned test automation.     Experience using tools such as Web Service testing tools, Jenkins and Maven.     A passion for delivering high quality, with a strong understanding and knowledge of all phases of testing and standard testing techniques.     3+ years of testing Web Applications and building functional and non-functional automation tests.     Experience of JIRA      ISTQB certification an advantage
